name: RomanThesis(DEMO)
description:
After 3 years of living an average school life, the protagonist finally came out of his shell and is now ready for an exciting senior college life.

What he thought was exciting, blew him off as he found out that in the same class he's actually classmates with the 2 most popular girls in the whole university. The T-University Divas. Also at the section a mysterious student unfamiliar to the protagonist.

Could this be the exciting life that he was expecting? Or will this be the worst he would ever have?
